div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-end; width: 224px; height: 1px; padding-top: 161px; margin-left: 43px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: right;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(200, 113, 4); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.font: Every member of agile teams and organizations has a say. We want to give you more responsibility and freedom to plan your own work.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-end; width: 249px; height: 1px; padding-top: 281px; margin-left: 123px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: right;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(18, 128, 176); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.font: Through agile's increased transparency, incremental development and clear processes, we can minimize risks and delays, and reduce workplace stress!

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 242px; height: 1px; padding-top: 281px; margin-left: 617px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(96, 90, 140); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.font: Extensive testing, customer feedback, documentation and translation are now integrated into our agile development processes to let us deliver the best quality product, every time.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 235px; height: 1px; padding-top: 56px; margin-left: 407px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(200, 113, 4); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.font: Agile processes have built-in fast feedback cycles so we can find out and deliver what our customers need and want.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 231px; height: 1px; padding-top: 161px; margin-left: 512px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(123, 172, 54); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.span: We are introducing several tools to help everyone plan, communicate and collaborate effectively and efficiently.
